name: SplitEm - Hyper Casual Game
description:
SplitEm is a classic and exciting hyper casual arcade scoring game. Just play it to train your reflexes and have fun. The game is challenging and fun to play.

Just touch the screen, move left ,move right or Split in half to survive.remember to catch the yellow Diamonds to unlock new Skins, compete with friends and family from all around the world

How high can you get? 

Move up FAST ,pick up gems while dodging spikes and get as high as you can to get to the Leaderboard and secure your EPIC high score
Need something new? Unlock fabulous skins with the gems you collected through your way.

When you've improved your skills and reflexes, Test them in the leaderboard where you're going to compete with other people around the world and receive achievements

What are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun, trying to relax, spending time, or trying to improve your skills as a SplitEm master , this is the game for you

You're going to love these features (⭐_⭐) :

◉ Endless Level
◉ Fun Gameplay
◉ Thrilling beats
◉ 7 Different songs to choose from
◉ Avoid Spikes, collect Gems,Split in half
◉ Over 10 different Skins 
◉ 3 Different image Effects
◉ Available in English 🇬🇧, French 🇫🇷 and German 🇩🇪
◉ Free to Play

Just download SplitEm and play it with other friends in the world.

**WARNING: this game is insanely addictive!**

Have any problems or suggestions? You can reach us at flytraparts@gmail.com

SplitEm is a free game supported with ads. an option for removing ads is available through a one-time in-app purchase that will remove ads forever
